suncertify.controller

Interface DatabaseAccessDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DatabaseAccessDaoLocal, DatabaseAccessDaoRemote

    public interface DatabaseAccessDao
    The interface of the DAO pattern implementation for the URLyBird Application.
    Since:
    15/04/2014
    Author:
    Luke GJ Potter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean bookHotelRoom(long recordNumber, java.lang.String customerName, java.lang.String endDate, long lockCookie)

    • Method Detail

      • findHotelRooms

        java.util.ArrayList<HotelRoom> findHotelRooms(java.lang.String... searchStrings)
        Finds the HotelRoom records that match the arguments.
        Parameters:
        searchStrings - The criteria to compare the database records to.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of the HotelRoom object that match the criteria.

      • getRecordPositionInDatabase

        long getRecordPositionInDatabase(java.lang.String... recordNameAndLocation)
        Returns the record number of the database record matching the specified name and location.
        Parameters:
        recordNameAndLocation - The name and location of the HotelRoom record to get the database position of.
        Returns:
        The record number of the record's position in the database file.

      • retrieveAllHotelRooms

        java.util.ArrayList<HotelRoom> retrieveAllHotelRooms()
        Gets all the HotelRoom objects in the database.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of the all the HotelRoom objects in the database.

      • bookHotelRoom

        boolean bookHotelRoom(long recordNumber,
                    java.lang.String customerName,
                    java.lang.String endDate,
                    long lockCookie)
        This method allows the booking of a HotelRoom.
        Parameters:
        recordNumber - The record number of the desired HotelRoom.
        customerName - The CSR number of the booker.
        endDate - The string representation of the date when the booking is due to expire.
        lockCookie - The key to lock the record with.
        Returns:
        True, if the booking was successful. False, if the booking was not successful.
